scripts.icons:prepare:
if ! which icon-font-generator > /dev/null; then echo '
"icon-font-generator" must be installed globally - please run "npm i -g icon-font-generator" and try again
' && exit 1; fi
scripts.icons: yarn icons:prepare && icon-font-generator icons/*.svg -o public/icons --prefix icon --fontspath '' --height 2000 --html false --json false --descent 350
